title: EMERGENCY SITUATION !!! !!!
body:
Hi everyone,

I saw some students play LOL on the uni computer ( located in HUB central )... Anyone knows how to do that because I always get stuck in in installing LOL in Uni computer.

Thanks,

replies.body: They might have League of Legends installed on a USB drive; however, this may not work sometimes, as you also need dependencies that need to be installed for League of Legends to work. You can give it a shot, but you might end up crashing, so be sure to try it in a custom match first. Let me know if you have any questions about this.
